text: The Israelites again did evil in the Lord’s sight, so the Lord handed them over to the Philistines for 40 years.
There was a man named Manoah from Zorah, from the Danite tribe. His wife was infertile and childless.
The angel of the Lord appeared to the woman and said to her, “You are infertile and childless, but you will conceive and have a son.

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="08104 04994">be careful</st>! Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st> or <st data-num="07941" class="">beer</st>, and do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> food that will make you <st data-num="02931" class="">ritually unclean</st>.<n id="1" />
Look, you will conceive and have a son. You must never cut his hair, for the child will be dedicated to God from birth. He will begin to deliver Israel from the power of the Philistines.”
The woman went and said to her husband, “A man sent from God came to me! He looked like God’s angel—he was very awesome. I did not ask him where he came from, and he did not tell me his name.

He said to me, ‘Look, you will conceive and have a son. So now, do not drink wine or beer and do not eat any food that will make you ritually unclean. For the child will be dedicated to God from birth till the day he dies.’”
Manoah prayed to the Lord, “Please, Lord, allow the man sent from God to visit us again, so he can teach us how we should raise the child who will be born.”

<st data-num="0430" class="">God</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="04495" class="">Manoah’s</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">prayer</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0430" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="04397" class="">angel</st> <st data-num="0935 0413">visited</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">again</st> while <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> was <st data-num="03427" class="">sitting</st> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st>. But her <st data-num="0376" class="">husband</st> <st data-num="04495" class="">Manoah</st> <st data-num="0369" class="">was not</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> her.

The <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="07323" class="">ran</st> <st data-num="04116" class="">at once</st> and <st data-num="05046" class="">told</st> her <st data-num="0376" class="">husband</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="02009" class="">Come quickly</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="0935 0413">visited</st><n id="3" /> me the other <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> has <st data-num="07200" class="">appeared</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me!”

So <st data-num="04495" class="">Manoah</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">got up</st> and <st data-num="01980 0310">followed</st> his <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>. When he <st data-num="0935 0413">met</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st>, he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to him, “Are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> my <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>?”<n id="2" /> He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="0589" class="">Yes</st>.”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="04495" class="">Manoah</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st>, when your <st data-num="01697" class="">announcement</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">comes true</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04100" class="">how</st> should the <st data-num="05288" class="">child</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">raised</st> and what should he <st data-num="04639" class="">do</st>?”<n id="2" />
The angel of the Lord told Manoah, “Your wife should pay attention to everything I told her.

She should <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">drink</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="01612 03196">grapevine</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">produces</st>. She must <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="03196" class="">wine</st> or <st data-num="07941" class="">beer</st>, and she must <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> food that will make her <st data-num="02932" class="">ritually unclean</st>.<n id="2" /> She should <st data-num="08104" class="">obey</st> <st data-num="03605 0834">everything</st> I <st data-num="06680" class="">commanded</st> her to do.”
Manoah said to the angel of the Lord, “Please stay here awhile, so we can prepare a young goat for you to eat.”

The angel of the Lord said to Manoah, “If I stay, I will not eat your food. But if you want to make a burnt sacrifice to the Lord, you should offer it.” (He said this because Manoah did not know that he was the angel of the Lord.)
Manoah said to the angel of the Lord, “Tell us your name, so we can honor you when your announcement comes true.”
The angel of the Lord said to him, “You should not ask me my name because you cannot comprehend it.”
Manoah took a young goat and a grain offering and offered them on a rock to the Lord. The Lord’s messenger did an amazing thing as Manoah and his wife watched.
As the flame went up from the altar toward the sky, the angel of the Lord went up in it while Manoah and his wife watched. They fell facedown to the ground.
The angel of the Lord did not appear again to Manoah and his wife. After all this happened Manoah realized that the visitor had been the angel of the Lord.

<st data-num="04495" class="">Manoah</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>, “We will <st data-num="04191" class="">certainly</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> we have <st data-num="07200" class="">seen</st> a <st data-num="0430" class="">supernatural being</st>!”<n id="1" />

But his wife said to him, “If the Lord wanted to kill us, he would not have accepted the burnt offering and the grain offering from us. He would not have shown us all these things or have spoken to us like this just now.”
Manoah’s wife gave birth to a son and named him Samson. The child grew and the Lord empowered him.
The Lord’s Spirit began to control him in Mahaneh Dan between Zorah and Eshtaol.
